DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety efficacy Pixel RF ( fractional radio frequency ) module treatment acne scar wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: Fractional Ablative Radiofrequency Treatment Acne Scars Wrinkles
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective open label study . Up 20 subject gender acne scar and/or wrinkle face recruit . The subject treat clean acne scar skin three time wrinkle skin Pixel RF handpiece . Each treatment duration approximately 30 minute . The initial power number pass parameter shall set accord clinical indication skin type subject treat ( well result test site ) . Clinical improvement assess investigator physician visual appearance treat area accord follow scale : -1 exacerbation , 0 change , 1 1 % -25 % improvement , 2 25 % -50 % improvement , 3 50 % -75 % improvement , 4 75 % -99 % improvement . Adverse side effect score clinical evaluation erythema , edema , burn . Real-time assessment make well investigator . Treatment result document Case Report Form follow-up session ( 1 , 5 day treatment 1 month 3 month treatment ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet follow inclusion criterion may participate : Male female subject 1860 year age . Clinically documented roll boxcar acne scar and/or wrinkle score 2 3 per RaoGoldman scale ( see section 6.5.1 wrinkle classification ) . Limitation acne scar wrinkle area : face . Patients must commit followup visit . Subjects meet follow criterion exclude participation : Bacterial viral infection Impaired immune system Isotretinoin ( Accutane , Amnesteem , Claravis , Sotret ) past 6 month Scleroderma Extensive radiation therapy Burns treatment area Poor healing treatment area Metal implant near treatment area Implantable pacemaker automatic defibrillator/cardioverter ( AICD ) Ablative/nonablative cosmetic intervention ( deep peeling ) past 3 month area treat Active cancer Active collagen vascular disease Pregnancy IVF procedure
